trans-unit.source: Compliance policy settings for Android devices | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Compliance policy settings for Android devices | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the device compliance policy settings for Android devices.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes the device compliance policy settings for Android devices.

trans-unit.source: Compliance policy settings for Android devices in Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Compliance policy settings for Android devices in Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: The policy settings described in this topic apply to devices running Android 4.0 and later, or Samsung KNOX 4.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: The policy settings described in this topic apply to devices running Android 4.0 and later, or Samsung KNOX 4.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: If you are looking for information about other platforms, select one of the following:
trans-unit.target: If you are looking for information about other platforms, select one of the following:

trans-unit.source: [Compliance policy settings for iOS devices](ios-compliance-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md)
trans-unit.target: [Compliance policy settings for iOS devices](ios-compliance-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md)

trans-unit.source: [Compliance policy settings for Windows devices](windows-compliance-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md)
trans-unit.target: [Compliance policy settings for Windows devices](windows-compliance-policy-settings-in-microsoft-intune.md)

trans-unit.source: System security settings
trans-unit.target: System security settings

trans-unit.source: Password
trans-unit.target: Password

trans-unit.source: **Require a password to unlock mobile devices:** Set this to **Yes** to require users to enter a password before they can access their device.
trans-unit.target: **Require a password to unlock mobile devices:** Set this to **Yes** to require users to enter a password before they can access their device.

trans-unit.source: **Minimum password length:** Specify the minimum number of digits or characters that the user’s password must contain.
trans-unit.target: **Minimum password length:** Specify the minimum number of digits or characters that the user’s password must contain.

trans-unit.source: **Password quality:** Enable this setting to configure password requirements for Android devices.
trans-unit.target: **Password quality:** Enable this setting to configure password requirements for Android devices.

trans-unit.source: Choose from:
trans-unit.target: Choose from:

trans-unit.source: **Low security biometric**
trans-unit.target: **Low security biometric**

trans-unit.source: **Required**
trans-unit.target: **Required**

trans-unit.source: **At least numeric**
trans-unit.target: **At least numeric**

trans-unit.source: **At least alphabetic**
trans-unit.target: **At least alphabetic**

trans-unit.source: **At least alphanumeric**
trans-unit.target: **At least alphanumeric**

trans-unit.source: **Alphanumeric with symbols**
trans-unit.target: **Alphanumeric with symbols**

trans-unit.source: **Minutes of inactivity before password is required:** Specifies the idle time before the user must re-enter their password.
trans-unit.target: **Minutes of inactivity before password is required:** Specifies the idle time before the user must re-enter their password.

trans-unit.source: **Password expiration (days):** Select the number of days before the user’s password expires and they must create a new one.
trans-unit.target: **Password expiration (days):** Select the number of days before the user’s password expires and they must create a new one.

trans-unit.source: **Remember password history:** Use this setting in conjunction with **Prevent reuse of previous passwords** to restrict the user from creating previously used passwords.
trans-unit.target: **Remember password history:** Use this setting in conjunction with **Prevent reuse of previous passwords** to restrict the user from creating previously used passwords.

trans-unit.source: **Prevent reuse of previous passwords:** If **Remember password history** is selected, specify the number of previously used passwords that cannot be re-used.
trans-unit.target: **Prevent reuse of previous passwords:** If **Remember password history** is selected, specify the number of previously used passwords that cannot be re-used.

trans-unit.source: **Require a password when the device returns from an idle state:** This setting should be used together with the in the **Minutes of inactivity before password is required** setting.
trans-unit.target: **Require a password when the device returns from an idle state:** This setting should be used together with the in the **Minutes of inactivity before password is required** setting.

trans-unit.source: The end-users are prompted to enter a password to access a device that has been inactive for the time specified in the **Minutes of inactivity before password is required** setting.
trans-unit.target: The end-users are prompted to enter a password to access a device that has been inactive for the time specified in the **Minutes of inactivity before password is required** setting.

trans-unit.source: Encryption
trans-unit.target: Encryption

trans-unit.source: **Require encryption on mobile device:** Set this to **Yes** to require devices to be encrypted in order to connect to resources.
trans-unit.target: **Require encryption on mobile device:** Set this to **Yes** to require devices to be encrypted in order to connect to resources.

trans-unit.source: Devices are encrypted when you configure the setting **Require a password to unlock mobile devices**.
trans-unit.target: Devices are encrypted when you configure the setting **Require a password to unlock mobile devices**.

trans-unit.source: Device health and security settings
trans-unit.target: Device health and security settings

trans-unit.source: **Device must not be jailbroken or rooted:** If you enable this setting, jailbroken devices will be evaluated as noncompliant.
trans-unit.target: **Device must not be jailbroken or rooted:** If you enable this setting, jailbroken devices will be evaluated as noncompliant.

trans-unit.source: **Require that devices prevent installation of apps from unknown sources (Android 4.0 or later)** To block devices that have the **Security > Unknown sources** enabled on the device, enable this setting and set it to **Yes**.
trans-unit.target: **Require that devices prevent installation of apps from unknown sources (Android 4.0 or later)** To block devices that have the **Security > Unknown sources** enabled on the device, enable this setting and set it to **Yes**.

trans-unit.source: Side-loading applications requires that the **Unknown sources** setting is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Side-loading applications requires that the **Unknown sources** setting is enabled.

trans-unit.source: You should only enforce this compliance policy if you are not side-loading Android apps on devices.
trans-unit.target: You should only enforce this compliance policy if you are not side-loading Android apps on devices.

trans-unit.source: **Require that USB debugging is disabled (Android 4.2 or later)**: This setting specifies whether to detect the USB debugging option on the device is enabled.
trans-unit.target: **Require that USB debugging is disabled (Android 4.2 or later)**: This setting specifies whether to detect the USB debugging option on the device is enabled.

trans-unit.source: **Require devices have enabled Scan device for security threats (Android 4.2-4.4)**: This setting specifies that the **Verify apps** feature is enabled on the device.
trans-unit.target: **Require devices have enabled Scan device for security threats (Android 4.2-4.4)**: This setting specifies that the **Verify apps** feature is enabled on the device.

trans-unit.source: **Minimum Android security patch level (Android 6.0 or later)**: Use this setting to specify the minimum Android patch level.
trans-unit.target: **Minimum Android security patch level (Android 6.0 or later)**: Use this setting to specify the minimum Android patch level.

trans-unit.source: Devices that are not at least at this patch level will be noncompliant.
trans-unit.target: Devices that are not at least at this patch level will be noncompliant.

trans-unit.source: The date must be specified the format: YYYY-MM-DD.
trans-unit.target: The date must be specified the format: YYYY-MM-DD.

trans-unit.source: **Require device threat protection to be enabled**: Use this setting to take the risk assessment from the Lookout MTP solution as a condition for compliance.
trans-unit.target: **Require device threat protection to be enabled**: Use this setting to take the risk assessment from the Lookout MTP solution as a condition for compliance.

trans-unit.source: Select the maximum allowed threat level, which is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: Select the maximum allowed threat level, which is one of the following:

trans-unit.source: **None (secured)** This is the most secure.
trans-unit.target: **None (secured)** This is the most secure.

trans-unit.source: This means that the device cannot have any threats.
trans-unit.target: This means that the device cannot have any threats.

trans-unit.source: If the device is detected as having any level of threats, it will be evaluated as non-compliant.
trans-unit.target: If the device is detected as having any level of threats, it will be evaluated as non-compliant.

trans-unit.source: **Low:** Device is evaluated as compliant if only low level threats are present.
trans-unit.target: **Low:** Device is evaluated as compliant if only low level threats are present.

trans-unit.source: Anything higher puts the device in a non-compliant status.
trans-unit.target: Anything higher puts the device in a non-compliant status.

trans-unit.source: **Medium:** Device is evaluated as compliant if the threats that are present on the device are low or medium level.
trans-unit.target: **Medium:** Device is evaluated as compliant if the threats that are present on the device are low or medium level.

trans-unit.source: If the device is detected to have high level threats, it is determined as non-compliant.
trans-unit.target: If the device is detected to have high level threats, it is determined as non-compliant.

trans-unit.source: **High:** This is the least secure.
trans-unit.target: **High:** This is the least secure.

trans-unit.source: Essentially, this allows all threat levels, and perhaps only useful if you using this solution only for reporting purposes.
trans-unit.target: Essentially, this allows all threat levels, and perhaps only useful if you using this solution only for reporting purposes.

trans-unit.source: For more details, see [Enable device threat protection rule in the compliance policy](enable-device-threat-protection-rule-in-compliance-policy.md).
trans-unit.target: For more details, see [Enable device threat protection rule in the compliance policy](enable-device-threat-protection-rule-in-compliance-policy.md).

trans-unit.source: Device property settings
trans-unit.target: Device property settings

trans-unit.source: **Minimum OS required:** When a device does not meet the minimum OS version requirement, it is reported as noncompliant.
trans-unit.target: **Minimum OS required:** When a device does not meet the minimum OS version requirement, it is reported as noncompliant.

trans-unit.source: A link with information on how to upgrade is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A link with information on how to upgrade is displayed.

trans-unit.source: The end-user can choose to upgrade their device after which they can access company resources.
trans-unit.target: The end-user can choose to upgrade their device after which they can access company resources.

trans-unit.source: **Maximum OS version allowed:** When a device is using an OS version later than the one specified in the rule, access to company resources is blocked and the user is asked to contact their IT admin.
trans-unit.target: **Maximum OS version allowed:** When a device is using an OS version later than the one specified in the rule, access to company resources is blocked and the user is asked to contact their IT admin.

trans-unit.source: Until there is a change in rule to allow the OS version, this device cannot be used to access company resources.
trans-unit.target: Until there is a change in rule to allow the OS version, this device cannot be used to access company resources.
